data.event: It has a population of 2,777 residents, according to the 2010 census, and is located 26.5 miles northwest of Minneapolis.
According to the Minnesota Historical Society, Greenfield became incorporated on March 14, 1958.

event.title: was established by the Wright County commissioners on September 6, 1856

data.event: Originally, the Rockford School District was established by the Wright County commissioners on September 6, 1856, and the first school house was constructed by 1860.
